imdb.title: Kamisama hajimemashita
imdb.plot: Momozono Nanami is only 17 years old, but she has never felt lucky. She has quite an average academic progress and boys do not think that she is cute. She would love to fix her school problems and spare more time for the girls' st...

episodes.title: The God Goes to Hot Spring
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The God Leaps Into the Past
episodes.plot: A curse from Tomoe's past catches up with him; Nanami desperately seeks answers to save Tomoe.

episodes.title: Episode #2.1
episodes.plot: Nanami is invited to the annual gathering of the gods in Izumo, but on the one condition that she must pass a test administered by Otohiko.

episodes.title: The God Goes to Izumo
episodes.plot: Now that Nanami is set to go to Izumo to attend the Divine Assembly, she must decide who goes with her - Tomoe or Mizuki. And she must also face the consequences of attending a divine event as a mortal being.

episodes.title: The God Falls Into the Netherworld
episodes.plot: Okuninushi, the god hosting the Divine Assembly, asks Nanami to go handle a situation happening on the border between the worlds of the living and the dead.

episodes.title: The God Races Across the Netherworld
episodes.plot: Izanami imprisons Kirihito and refuses to allow Nanami to return to the surface with him. Nanami must decide how much she believes in her own powers and what she is willing to risk to save him.

episodes.title: The God Makes Her Second Romantic Confession
episodes.plot: When Tomoe reverted to being a wild fox to save Nanami, he undid his contract as her familiar. And now, he takes this opportunity to reconsider whether he wants to go back to Nanami or not.

episodes.title: The God Meets a Little Tengu
episodes.plot: On her way home, Nanami runs into Himemiko and they spend some quality girl time together. Later, she meets a little tengu on a mission.

episodes.title: The God Goes to Mount Kurama
episodes.plot: Kurama returns to Mount Kurama with Nanami and Tomoe to take Botanmaru home and see if he can help his ailing father.

episodes.title: The God Sneaks In
episodes.plot: Kurama's father is sick, but there is no easy way to get in to see him, so the gang must devise a way to get past Jiro's defenses.

episodes.title: The God Is Blindsided
episodes.plot: The ruse is simple. Nanami confers her godly powers to Kurama, so he can pretend to be a god, someone Jiro cannot turn away from the gates. While Kurama and Tomoe distract Jiro, Nanami sneaks in to deliver the cure.

episodes.title: The God Receives a Romantic Confession
episodes.plot: The search for the Sojobo's soul leads to an unexpected place and an unexpected confession.

episodes.title: The God Goes Back to Being a Child
episodes.plot: Kirihito, aka Akura-oh, has not given up on getting his body back from the Netherworld. But in the meantime, Nanami and her familiars go to see the Year God, to receive a talisman for the new year.

episodes.title: The God Receives a Marriage Proposal
episodes.plot: Tomoe gets some insight into Nanami's childhood. And they finally get through the torii gates to see the Year God.

episodes.title: Nanami Becomes a God
episodes.plot: Nanami decides to hold an autumn festival at the shrine to let the locals know that it's not abandoned or haunted. But as she prepares for the festival, Otohiko comes along to throw a wrench into things.

episodes.title: The God Becomes a Target
episodes.plot: Nanami discovers that Kurama, a famous pop star, has transferred to her high school, which spurs her to return to school. However, as a weak land god, her life may be at risk if she wanders outside the shrine alone.

episodes.title: The God Makes a Match
episodes.plot: The land under Mikage Shrine's protection includes Isara Swamp and Himemiko, its guardian mistress, comes to pay her respects to the new land god. And Nanami's divine matchmaking powers are put to the test for the first time.

episodes.title: The God Is Kidnapped
episodes.plot: Nanami saves a pretty white snake at school and for her trouble, she becomes marked as the snake's intended. Tomoe transfers into Nanami's class to protect her, but the snake comes for her anyway.

episodes.title: The God Loses Her Home
episodes.plot: Narukami, god of thunder, has always wanted Tomoe as a familiar for herself. Now that the god he serves is Nanami, a human girl, Narukami sees her chance to take away Nanami's godhood and make Tomoe hers.

episodes.title: The God Catches a Cold
episodes.plot: Nanami stays home with a cold while Tomoe goes to school disguised as her in order to keep her attendance rate from slipping. Mizuki takes advantage of Tomoe's absence to pay Nanami a visit.

episodes.title: The God Asks a Boy Out on a Date
episodes.plot: Nanami experiments a little with her divine powers while she struggles to define exactly how she feels about Tomoe. And Kurama, being the yokai who has more experience with humans, offers some words of advice to Tomoe.

episodes.title: The God Goes to the Beach
episodes.plot: Summer break is here and Nanami goes to the beach with her friends to take her mind off her broken heart. Trouble ensues when Tomoe accompanies her and goes into the ocean against his better judgment.

episodes.title: The God Goes to the Dragon King's Palace
episodes.plot: In her quest to recover the stolen Dragon King's right eye and return it to him in exchange for Tomoe's freedom, Nanami travels back in time and gets a glimpse of Tomoe's past.

episodes.title: Tomoe Becomes A Familiar/The God Goes To A Mixer
episodes.plot: Flashing back to the past, some of what Tomoe went through with Mikage is revealed. And returning to the present for the second part, Nanami gets dragged off to a mixer with her friends.

episodes.title: The Familiar Goes Into Town
episodes.plot: Mizuki ventures into the city alone to learn the secret to making it in human society like the super popular pop star Kurama. And Nanami drags Tomoe off on a date to the amusement park.

episodes.title: Nanami Quits Being a God
episodes.plot: Nanami decides to hold an autumn festival at the shrine to let the locals know that it's not abandoned or haunted. But as she prepares for the festival, Otohiko comes along to throw a wrench into things.

episodes.title: I've Started the Being a God Thing
episodes.plot: Unable to exorcise the miasma encroaching on the shrine, Nanami believes she is useless and leaves. Finding her gone, Tomoe and Mizuki go searching for her, leaving the shrine and the miasma to Onikiri and Kotetsu.
